title: League of Legends Playable on NextBook?
body:
I recently acquired a NextBook and was wondering if League would be playable on the device.
To my understanding the Netbook has issues with playability due to issues with the CPU and graphics compatibility with the game.
So I would just like to know if the NextBook has better chances with playability?
Or is it just doomed to be a flop?

replies.body: If you want something to play LoL on i would recommend a laptop with an AMD CPU/GPU combo. Even the lower end ones can play this game and there cheaper.

Hey AverraV,

The Nextbook is better for League than your standard Netbook, but both are still under the minimum required specifications. I recommend you check out our [minimum requirements](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements#wq1) for League.
Plan on if you're able to play the game you're going to have frequent problems anyway related to Riot's updates that destroy game stability.
